channel.title: ClickHouse connection error
channel.description:
Hello.
I created ClickHouse datasource connection - and got error.
Connection Test Failed: Connection error to: http:\\localhost:8123 (InvalidURL).
May you help me set up a connection? Thanks.
### Technical details:
* Redash Version: 8.0.0+b32245 (a16f551e) * Browser/OS: Google Chrome Version 110.0.5481.178 (64-bit) * How did you install Redash: docker

item.title: ClickHouse connection error
item.dc:creator: Mason
item.description:
Hello.

I created ClickHouse datasource connection - and got error.

Connection Test Failed:
Connection error to: http:\localhost:8123 (InvalidURL).

May you help me set up a connection?
Thanks.
